SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_ADDCHILDREN
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to add a children to a sponsor interaction extension
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_ADDCHILDREN ( @interactionID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Interaction ID to add the child to. @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The children to add to the interactionbe set ineligible @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier = null -- Used to track who added the interaction, retrieved with USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT if null ) as begin set nocount on
-- Constants declare @raiseErrorIfNotFoundTrue bit = 1
declare @childCountLetterVersion_OneChildLetter uniqueidentifier = null declare @childCountLetterVersion_TwoChildrenLetter uniqueidentifier = null declare @childCountLetterVersion_MultipleChildrenLetter uniqueidentifier = null
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @currentDate datetime = null set @currentDate = getdate()
begin try -- Get letter code table ids select @childCountLetterVersion_OneChildLetter = ID from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE where DESCRIPTION = lower ('One Child Letter') if @childCountLetterVersion_OneChildLetter is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not add child to interaction, because the id for the "One Child Letter" could not be found.'
select @childCountLetterVersion_TwoChildrenLetter = ID from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE where DESCRIPTION = lower ('Two Children Letter') if @childCountLetterVersion_OneChildLetter is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not add child to interaction, because the id for the "Two Children Letter" could not be found.'
select @childCountLetterVersion_MultipleChildrenLetter = ID from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE where DESCRIPTION = lower ('Multiple Children Letter') if @childCountLetterVersion_MultipleChildrenLetter is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not add child to interaction, because the id for the "Multiple Children Letter" could not be found.'
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
-- Add the child insert dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONCHILDREN (INTERACTIONID, SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) select @interactionID, sponsorshipOpportunityChildID, @changeAgentID, @changeAgentID, @currentDate, @currentDate from @childIDList childlist where not exists (select INTERACTIONID from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONCHILDREN where INTERACTIONID = @interactionID and SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = childlist.sponsorshipOpportunityChildID)
-- Update the letter version based on the number of children on this interaction declare @numberOfChildren as smallint = 0 set @numberOfChildren = dbo.USR_UFN_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_GETCHILDCOUNT (@interactionID)
if @numberOfChildren >= 0 update dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION set CHILDCOUNTLETTERVERSIONCODEID = case @numberOfChildren when 0 then null when 1 then @childCountLetterVersion_OneChildLetter when 2 then @childCountLetterVersion_TwoChildrenLetter else @childCountLetterVersion_MultipleChildrenLetter end where ID = @interactionID else RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not set Child Count Letter Version - USR_UFN_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_GETCHILDCOUNT returned a value less than zero' end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0 end
